nde2.methodcalls.delivery

Class BaseMethodCall

  • java.lang.Object
    • nde2.methodcalls.BaseMethodCall
      • nde2.methodcalls.delivery.BaseMethodCall
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GetTablesMethodCall

    public abstract class BaseMethodCall
extends BaseMethodCall
    This class specifies the NeSS/NDE2 Delivery endpoint of the web service and provides a base method for interacting with it.
    Author:
    filip

    • Method Detail

      • doCall_base

        protected Document doCall_base(String method,
                   Map<String,String> params)
                        throws ParserConfigurationException,
                               SAXException,
                               IOException,
                               XPathExpressionException,
                               NDE2Exception
        This method uses BaseMethodCall .doCall_base() to call the required method on the server, and then checks for service errors. Actual method calls to the NeSS API can, therefore, simply supply this function with required parameters and expect a valid response.
        Parameters:
        method - NeSS/NDE2 method to be called
        params - Parameters of the NeSS/NDE2 method
        Returns:
        A Document representation of the response, which is unlikely to contain errors.
        Throws:
        ParserConfigurationException - See BaseMethodCall
        SAXException - See BaseMethodCall
        IOException - See BaseMethodCall
        XPathExpressionException - Thrown if XPath fails
        NDE2Exception - Thrown if the server returned an <Error> instead of expected result
